title: The Dragon stirs
creator_credit: Liu Chun, Qi Kejun, Xue Song, Chen Meng, Lin Xiezhong, Wei Bin, Yu Bo, Yuan Zhengming, Zhao Shujing, ABC-TV (Australia), CCTV and Southern Star Entertainment
brief_description: A four-part historical series about China with the first two parts focussing on two major natural disasters which occurred during the 20th century and the final two parts exploring the role of China’s women and their struggle for equality. Narrated by Peter George and Diana McLean.
